mapper.select: select al.ALIM_ID as alimId, al.RECEIVE_MEMBER_ID as receiveMemberId, al.SEND_MEMBER_ID as sendMemberId, al.CONTENT as content, al.CREATE_TIME as createTime, al.READ_YN as readYn, al.URL as url, m.nickname from alim al inner join member m on (m.member_id = al.SEND_MEMBER_ID) where 1 = 1 and al.receive_member_id = #{memberId} and al.read_yn = 'N' order by al.ALIM_ID desc
select count(*) from alim al where 1 = 1 and al.receive_member_id = #{memberId} and al.read_yn = 'N'
mapper.update: update alim al set al.read_yn = 'Y' where 1 = 1 and al.receive_member_id = #{memberId} and al.read_yn = 'N'
update alim al set al.read_yn = 'Y' where 1 = 1 and al.alim_id = #{alimId} and al.read_yn = 'N'
